content:
There are many properties that help set the styles of your web pages.

| Property | Description | W3 Schools Link|
|---|---|---|
|`background-color`|Sets the background color of the element|[W3 Schools](https://www.w3schools.com/css/css_background.asp)|
|`border-color`|Sets the color of the border|[W3 Schools](https://www.w3schools.com/css/css_border.asp)|
|`border-width`|Changes the border width of an element|[W3 Schools](https://www.w3schools.com/css/css_border.asp)|
|`border-style`|Changes the style of border|[W3 Schools](https://www.w3schools.com/css/css_border.asp)|
|`width`|Sets the width of an element|[W3 Schools](https://www.w3schools.com/css/css_dimension.asp)|
|`height`|Sets the height of an element|[W3 Schools](https://www.w3schools.com/css/css_dimension.asp)|
|`float`|Floats an element to one side of the page|[W3 Schools](https://www.w3schools.com/css/css_float.asp)|
|`margin`|Generates space around an element|[W3 Schools](https://www.w3schools.com/css/css_margin.asp)|
